hand module¶

class hand.Hand¶

Bases : object

A class that represent the hand of tiles that belongs to a player in a domino game.

…

tiles = list of tile object

List of the tiles within the hand

add_tile(tile):

Add a specified tile in the hand of its owner

score():

Calculate the score of the hand

play(tile):

Remove a tile from the hand in order to play it on the board

create_from_deck_without_draw(deck, number_of_player):

Create the hand of the player in a game without draw

create_from_deck_with_draw(deck, number_of_player):

Create the hand of the player in a game with draw

add_tile(tile)¶

Add a specified tile given in the parameters at the end of the hand.

Paramètres

tile (tile object) – Contains the value of the tile added

Renvoie

Type renvoyé

None

create_from_deck(deck, number_of_players, with_draw)¶

Create the hand of a player in a game without draw according to the number of players present in the game.

Paramètres

  • deck (deck object) – The hand of the player is creating from the deck

  • number_of_players (int) – The number of players involved in the game, it’s used to know how many tiles each player will have

Renvoie

Type renvoyé

None

remove(tile)¶

Search for a tile in the hand, remove and returns it.

score()¶

Returns the sum of the values of the tiles in the hand.
